name: photo-grid
description: Monorepo containing Photo Grid and its admin interface

scripts.prestart: node -e "if (!require('fs').existsSync('./apps/admin/.env.local')) { throw 'ERROR: env.local not found in apps/admin. Please refer to README.'; }"

author: Keith Wickramasekara

scripts.prepare: Husky install shouldn't run when installing packages with npm ci. Opting to use somewhat of a manual check for this to support different CI environments. See Husky docs for more info.
